Some merchants notice a definite lull lately. Some like Dobe and Andy Restaurant say they believe some people are staying away because of worries over #Coronavirus but hoping itâ€™s short lived, adding that they remain open for business. #CJAD800

Merchants in Chinatown feeling the ripple effect of #Coronavirus. One restaurant posted a sign advising recent visitors from China to stay away for at least two weeks but took it down after a day saying it was awkward to refuse customers & make them uneasy for nothing. #CJAD800

Working in the infection control industry, I can tell you first-hand that consumer panic around the coronavirus outbreak is already causing supply issues for hospitals & other healthcare agencies. Get properly informed. The panic is not merited or helpful.
